nodes.text: The Imperial medical transport was a class of transport used by the reconstituted Sith Empire around the time of the sacking of Coruscant.
The Imperial medical transport had a belly door and carried members of the Imperial Medical Corps. It also carried medical supplies and medical droids.

One of these transports, the Steadfast, was used to pick up the wounded and dead Imperials after the Sacking of Coruscant. It also took the Twi'lek Eleena Daru at the command of Darth Malgus, even though she was alien.
